page.name: Infested Northland Shores
page.description: On the edge of the Northland,fungal growths and creatures seem to be making their spread.

properties.name: Infested Northland Shores
properties.description: On the edge of the Northland,fungal growths and creatures seem to be making their spread.
properties.complete: The Hollow may have been driven back, but the fungus still stretches on, unabated.

page.name: Tyndur's Disarray
page.description: The fallout of fungal growth spreading from the Northlands rift has displaced many creatures and peoples, and unfortunately, they will fight for every scrap they can find.

properties.description: The fallout of fungal growth spreading from the Northlands rift has displaced many creatures and peoples, and unfortunately, they will fight for every scrap they can find.
properties.complete: The Rift must be closed, before all of Lore becomes overrun.
